description:
Reproduce Steps:
1.  Launch instance with "Boot from Image(create a new volume)" -- successful
2.  Create snapshot from the instance. -- successful.
3.  Launch instance with the snapshot created on step2. --successful
4.  Create snapshot from the instance created on step3 -- Error: Unable to create snapshot
title: Unable to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created from volume base instance

comments.content:
Reproduce Steps:
1.  Launch instance with "Boot from Image(create a new volume)" -- successful
2.  Create snapshot from the instance. -- successful.
3.  Launch instance with the snapshot created on step2. --successful
4.  Create snapshot from the instance created on step3 -- Error: Unable to create snapshot
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ianch

comments.content:
Error  in log
INFO nova.compute.api [req-a6c6a4d7-5160-44ef-b646-dec7944672a8 00754d2bbf2f4d59949582dc6470a747 0cccc0f30f7f4726a286b1fc99a6dcec - - -] [instance: 7a072668-5a2c-4152-b97a-1bbf717fa93e] Skipping quiescing instance: NV-A006DB4 Quiescing is not supported in instance 7a072668-5a2c-4152-b97a-1bbf717fa93e: QEMU guest agent is not enabled
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/oslo_messaging/rpc/server.py", line 142, in inner
    return func(*args, **kwargs)

  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/exception.py", line 88, in wrapped
    payload)

  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/oslo_utils/excutils.py", line 85, in __exit__
    six.reraise(self.type_, self.value, self.tb)

  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/exception.py", line 71, in wrapped
    return f(self, context, *args, **kw)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ianch

comments.content: Can you please mention the version you got this error?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~challa-bhargavi1

comments.content: It was found in Kilo release. Sorry for not mentioning that.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ianch

comments.content:
I have created test cases for verifying the bug. Please execute these test cases once the fix is done.

Test case id: OPNST_NOVA Bug: Unable to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created from volume base instance_1

Metric: 30 minutes

Test purpose: Test to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created image

Configuration: An OpenStack environment with at least one controller (with keystone, glance), one compute node and one network node installed.

Test tool: tempest

References: Bug_1548666_Unable to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created from volume base instance

Applicability: Test can be done creating the snapshot that created from image base instance

Pre-test conditions: Openstack should be installed and all the services up and running

Step Description: 
1.	Launch an instance with “Boot from image ”
2.	Create a snapshot from the instance
3.	Launch instance with the snapshot created on step 2
4.	Create snapshot from the instance created on step 3
Result:
1.	User should be able  to launch instance with boot from image 
2.	User should be able to take the snapshot
3.	User should be able to launch the instance with the snapshot created
4.	User should be able to create the snapshot from the instance created on step 3
Test verdict: Fails only if user should not be able to create a snapshot from an instance which is launched from a snapshot



Test case id: OPNST_NOVA Bug: Unable to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created from volume base instance_2

Metric: 30 minutes

Test purpose: Test to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created from volume base

Configuration: An OpenStack environment with at least one controller (with keystone, glance), one compute node and one network node installed.

Test tool: tempest

References: Bug_1548666_Unable to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created from volume base instance

Applicability: Test can be done creating the snapshot that created from volume base instance 

Pre-test conditions: Openstack should be installed and all the services up and running

Step Description: 
1.	Create a volume
2.	Launch an instance with “Boot from image ”  using the volume
3.	Create a snapshot from the instance
4.	Launch instance with the snapshot created on step3
5.	Create snapshot from the instance created on step4
Result:
1.	User should be able  to launch instance with boot from image  using the volume
2.	User should be able to take the snapshot
3.	User should be able to launch the instance with the snapshot created
4.	User should be able to create the snapshot from the instance created on step 4

Test verdict: Fails only if user should not be able to create a snapshot from an instance which is launched from a snapshot



Test case id: OPNST_NOVA Bug: Unable to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created from volume base instance_3

Metric: 30 minutes

Test purpose: Test to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created from volume base

Configuration: An OpenStack environment with at least one controller (with keystone, glance), one compute node and one network node installed.

Test tool: tempest

References: Bug_1548666_Unable to create snapshot from instance which is launched from a snapshot that created from volume base instance

Applicability: Test can be done creating the snapshot that created from volume base instance
 
Pre-test conditions: Openstack should be installed and all the services up and running

Step Description: 
1.	Create a volume
2.	Launch an instance with “Boot from image ”  using the volume using horizon
3.	Create a snapshot from the instance using horizon
4.	Launch instance with the snapshot created on step3 using horizon
5.	Create snapshot from the instance created on step4 using horizon
Result:
1.	User should be able  to launch instance with boot from image  using the volume
2.	User should be able to take the snapshot
3.	User should be able to launch the instance with the snapshot created
4.	User should be able to create the snapshot from the instance created on step 4

Test verdict: Fails only if user should not be able to create a snapshot from an instance which is launched from a snapshot
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~anseela-m00

comments.content: This isn't related to the client, the error is shown in a nova log.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~melwitt

comments.content:
The pasted log excerpt isn't an error, it's INFO saying the quiesce step was skipped because the QEMU guest agent isn't enabled in the deployment. That message is probably unrelated to the failure to create the snapshot.

There should be a message of log level ERROR in the nova-api.log or nova-compute.log. Can you provide any additional information such as the release version of nova you're using and the ERROR message from nova-compute.log?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~melwitt

comments.content: Marking this as invalid because too much time has passed since additional information was requested. If this is still an issue for you, please provide the requested information and reopen it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~auggy
